bioconda.name: bioconductor-ntw
bioconda.summary: Predict gene network using an Ordinary Differential Equation (ODE) based method

biotools.summary: This package predicts the gene-gene interaction network and identifies the direct transcriptional targets of the perturbation using an ODE (Ordinary Differential Equation) based method.

bioschemas.name: NTW
bioschemas.summary: This package predicts the gene-gene interaction network and identifies the direct transcriptional targets of the perturbation using an ODE (Ordinary Differential Equation) based method.
